ikkaku-madarame.name: Ikkaku Madarame
ikkaku-madarame.quote: I want to fight, I want to become stronger. It's simple as that!
ikkaku-madarame.description: 3rd Seat of Squad 11 who secretly achieved Bankai. A battle-loving warrior who follows Zaraki's philosophy of seeking strong opponents, while hiding his true power to remain in his preferred position. Incredibly lucky and proudly bald. As a Short Range fighter, he combines Fast Melee combat with unique triple-Stance mechanics through his three-part Zanpakutō, Hōzukimaru. After Awakening, his 'Ryūmon' Gauge builds up as he maintains offensive pressure, providing further buffs, while his Rushdown playstyle allows him to overwhelm opponents with relentless attacks. With high Power and Speed, but lower Range, Defense, and Technique, Ikkaku excels at aggressive combat that rewards luck, maintaining offensive momentum through careful stance management, and constant pressure.
ikkaku-madarame.tldr: Third Seat of Squad 11 and luckiest of Soul Society. Controls both pace and proximity in close-range battles. Has more moves than other characters and a wider range of actions to choose from. His many close-range moves enable you to press the attack. Single attacks deal low Reishi damage, so a vigorous offensive is necessary to win.

base.name: Signature Move: Slayer Stance
base.description: Take a crouching stance while activating Hozukimaru. Activate different moves from this stance depending on if a Quick Attack, Flash Attack, Signature Move or Step input it pressed. You get a Guard Point when you take this stance during the effects of Spritual Pressure Move 2: Watch Closely.

base.name: Signature Move: Rush Strike
base.description: Input a Flash Attack to leap forward to unleash a forceful thrust. Activates quickly and forcefully closes distances, giving it a variety of uses. This gets stronger and gains invincibility against projectile attacks while moving during the effects of Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Watch Closely.

base.name: Signature Move: Cleave Strike
base.description: Input a Quick Attack for a sweeping attack in front of you. Very powerful, and grants you the advantage even when guarded. Can combo into a Flash Attack on hit. During the effects of Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Watch Closely, this gets stronger and gets a Guard Point until the attack activates.

base.name: Signature Move: Counter Strike
base.description: Input a Dash to take an even deeper stance to fend off opponent attacks. Taking an attack triggers a counter. This counter gets dramatically stronger during the effects of Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Watch Closely.

base.name: Signature Move: Undo Stance
base.description: Input a Signature Move input to undo 'Slayer Stance'.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: It's My Lucky Day!
base.description: A powered-up Slayer Stance. Just like Signature Move: Slayer Stance, using a Quick Attack, Flash Attack, Signature Move or Step input activates different moves from this stance. Gain a Guard Point when you take this stance during the effects of Spiritual Pressure 2: Watch Closely.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Rush Strike Kai
base.description: Input a Flash Attack to leap forward and unleash a devastating thrust. Activates quickly, making it perfect for a combo finisher. This gets stronger and gains invincibility against projectile attacks while moving during the effects of Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Watch Closely.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Cleave Strike Kai
base.description: Input a Quick Attack for a fierce sweeping attack in front of you. Very powerful, and grants you the advantage even when guarded. Can combo into a Flash Attack on hit. During the effects of Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Watch Closely, this gets stronger and gets a Guard Point until the attack activates.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Counter Strike Kai
base.description: Input a Dash to take an even deeper stance to fend off opponent attacks. Taking an attack triggers a powerful counter. This counter gets dramatically stronger during the effects of Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Watch Closely..

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Undo Stance
base.description: Input a Signature Move input to undo 'It's My Lucky Day!'.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Watch Closely
base.description: Enjoy the battle, strengthening yourself for a brief period. Strengthens Signature Move: Slayer Stance, Spiritual Pressure Move 1: It's My Lucky Day, and actions transitioning from these moves.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Getaway Thrust
base.description: Back Step before rushing in quickly for a stab. Can be used to dodge before unleashing your own point-blank attack. Can transition quickly into Slayer Stance or a Step when it hits the opponent or their guard.

awakened.name: Awakening: Bankai - Ryūmon Hōzukimaru
awakened.description: Ikkaku spins Hōzukimaru above his head, yelling out as he releases his Bankai; his Shihakusho's top half becomes shed, as he gains a gigantic axe-head that floats behind him, adorned with a dragon, connected to two massive cleavers that Ikkaku holds; after Awakening, Ikkaku gets access to the `Ryūmon Gauge`, which increases by attacking Ikkaku's opponent or by taking damage. The higher the Gauge, the more damage Ikkaku deals.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Ryumon Gauge
awakened.description: A gauge exclusive to Ikkaku Madarame. Fills when you deal damage to an opponent's Reishi or take damage yourself. Your attacks do more damage the more the Ryumon Gauge is filled.

awakened.name: Signature Move: Slayer Stance

Activate different moves from this stance depending on if a Quick Attack, Flash Attack, Signature Move or Step input it pressed. You get a Guard Point when you take this stance during the effects of Spritual Pressure Move 2: Watch Closely.

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 1: Split Apart, Hozukimaru!
kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Time To Have Me Some Fun!
kikon.description: Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: Remember My Name
kikon.description: Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break. Destroys 5 Konpaku when the Ryumon Gauge is maxed out. Destroys 6 Konpaku when the Ryumon Gauge is maxed out with a Soul Break.

baseCombos.name: Special Flash Attack Offensive Hohō Combo
Step Quick Attack Offensive Hohō Combo
baseCombos.input: ANY -> Q -> Q -> Q -> Q -> R

baseCombos.name: Step Quick Attack Kikon Combo
baseCombos.input: ANY -> Q -> Q -> Q -> Q -> KI

Step Quick Attack Offensive Hohō Combo
